data.name: Project Romboid Demo
data.detailed_description:
Project Romboid is a hard, arcade roguelite shooter in which you will have to pick and combine items so that you can survive waves of enemies that will chase you and shoot at you. Every level, the player will be given three items to choose from, and some of these items will combine so give players powerful perks and improvements to their build.

Gameplay

  • Shoot at enemies to kill them
  • Random enemies each wave
  • New enemies appear every level completed
  • Every level new items to pick from
  • Bulle

    Demo Features

    • 2 unique bosses
    • 18 unique enemies
    • 35 unique items
    • 2 unique builds

data.short_description: Project Romboid is a hard, arcade roguelite shooter in which you will have to pick and combine items so that you can survive waves of enemies that will chase you and shoot at you. New items will appear every level. Combine them to create powerful builds that will help you survive.
